objects.text:
• Premium Vegan Leather
• Fashionable Crossbody Style
• Convenient Multi Pockets

product_details.name: KALIDI Crossbody Purses for Women Vegan Leather Bucket Bag Fashion Ladies Crossbody Handbag Shoulder Purse with Multi Pockets
product_details.description: Package Dimensions: 9.96 x 8.58 x 1.77 inches; 1.12 Pounds. Department: Women. Country of Origin: China. Customer Reviews: 4.7 4.7 out of 5 stars 122 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner design showcases a stylish product display for a vegan leather crossbody bag. On the left, the **heading** text layer uses bold typography in dark gray for strong visual impact. Below it, the **subheading** text layer uses soft desaturated blue to describe the product type with a clean and modern look. The **description** text layer follows, listing product features in a smaller gray font with bullet points for easy readability.

The **price** text layer is emphasized in bold black, drawing attention at the bottom. A blue rectangular **cta_background** behind the **cta** text layer ("SHOP NOW") invites action. On the right side, the **product_image** layer displays the crossbody bag prominently against a soft blue gradient **background** featuring subtle white shapes for depth and elegance.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Charcoal (#333333)
- Steel Blue (#5D7A9A)
- Light Slate Gray (#4A4A4A)
- Pure White (#FFFFFF)
- Gradient Baby Blue: from (#F0F4F8) to (#E0E8F0)
product_color: The product image features a stylish handbag with a sophisticated and balanced color palette. The left panel of the bag is a soft, textured cream beige (#F5EADB), giving it a warm, neutral tone. The right panel contrasts with a rich tweedy combination of deep navy blue (#1C2A3A), turquoise blue (#69C6D5), white (#FFFFFF), and hints of brown (#6E4E37). The strap and trim are a solid navy blue (#1C2A3A), providing depth and elegance. Gold metallic hardware (#D4AF37) adds a luxurious highlight. The blending of fabric textures and colors creates a chic design, perfect for banner ads emphasizing modern sophistication.
